price: 23. Such are they whom Allâh has cursed, so that He has made them deaf and blinded their sight.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu fa-aṣammahum wa-aʿmā abṣārahum
